name: Bellsprout

evolution.description: Bellsprout can evolve into Weepinbell at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Flower Pokémon. Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.
